message.body: I know you haven't been there much but I'd like to get Beth back there ASAP. When do you think you could have everything ready for her?
I can have it ready by tomorrow but if I'm living out of trash bags again then I mean

Bc then I'll just live somewhere else for awhile bc it's just too hard- I curate two spaces, have 3 pt jobs :( I pt gallery sit, so switching outfits and looking good at events is a big deal and stressful
But I can totally have it ready by tomorrow actually
Clothing and getting dressed and changing 2 times a day is a strangely huge part of my life lol
Sorry that I'm not calling- I'm babysitting and I just tried doing a business call w my friend over a project and Kyle screeeeamed as soon as I talked on the phone
Sorry. I'm at work now. I'll call / text tomorrow. Not sure how long it will take but I know Beth & she is Friggin Amazing!!
Call tomorrow and I'll def pick up and you can tell me what I need to do
And I'll do it all tomorrow
Sounds good. I'll call Beth in the morning.
I left Beth a message. I'm waiting to hear back from her.
